snippet.title: 【Apple Arcade】"Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE"PV
snippet.description:
"Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE"is available on Apple Arcade starting today!

 We've released a promo video that packs in all the charm of the game!
Original stages, such as live stages, and many new songs have been added to the game! A must-see for all Katamari fans.

Give it a try!

＜What is Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE?＞
Live streaming is buzzing across All Cosmos...
To stay ahead of the trend,
the King has finally made his streaming debut!
As soon as the Prince starts rolling his katamari, messages from fans worldwide flood in.
"Make it even bigger!" "Roll that up too!"
Driven by enthusiastic fan reactions, 
the King's live stream began to take bolder directions.
Now, Prince, it's time to grow your katamari and create stars for the fans.
Aim to be the top streamer in All Cosmos.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

Apple Store：https://apps.apple.com/us/app/katamari-damacy-rolling-live/id6449352814
Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE Official WebSite：https://katamaridamacy-rolling-live.bn-ent.net
Katamari Damacy Official X：https://x.com/katamariseries
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

*The user is responsible for any data charges incurred.
*Apple Arcade is trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions.
*A ¥900 monthly subscription is required for Apple Arcade.

Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE™& ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.
